EBfdlu8R27Fbx-ehrqwImnK-8Cm79sqbAQ4MmvEA.title: Qualified vLEI Issuer Credential
EBfdlu8R27Fbx-ehrqwImnK-8Cm79sqbAQ4MmvEA.description: A vLEI Credential issued by GLEIF to Qualified vLEI Issuers which allows the Qualified vLEI Issuers to issue, verify and revoke Legal Entity vLEI Credentials and Legal Entity Official Organizational Role vLEI Credentials

LEI.description: LEI of the requesting Legal Entity

l.const: Usage of a valid, unexpired, and non-revoked vLEI Credential, as defined in the associated Ecosystem Governance Framework, does not assert that the Legal Entity is trustworthy, honest, reputable in its business dealings, safe to do business with, or compliant with any laws or that an implied or expressly intended purpose will be fulfilled.

All information in a valid, unexpired, and non-revoked vLEI Credential, as defined in the associated Ecosystem Governance Framework, is accurate as of the date the validation process was complete. The vLEI Credential has been issued to the legal entity or person named in the vLEI Credential as the subject; and the qualified vLEI Issuer exercised reasonable care to perform the validation process set forth in the vLEI Ecosystem Governance Framework.

EBNaNu-M9P5cgrnfl2Fvymy4E_jvxxyjb70PRtiA.title: Legal Entity Official Organizational Role vLEI Credential
EBNaNu-M9P5cgrnfl2Fvymy4E_jvxxyjb70PRtiA.description: A vLEI Role Credential issued by a Qualified vLEI issuer to official representatives of a Legal Entity

auth.description: Chain to Auth vLEI credential from legal entity

n.description: SAID of the ACDC to which the edge connects

s.description: SAID of required schema of the credential pointed to by this node

o.description: Operator indicating this node is the issuer

l.const: Usage of a valid, unexpired, and non-revoked vLEI Credential, as defined in the associated Ecosystem Governance Framework, does not assert that the Legal Entity is trustworthy, honest, reputable in its business dealings, safe to do business with, or compliant with any laws or that an implied or expressly intended purpose will be fulfilled.

It is the sole responsibility of Holders as Issuees of an ECR vLEI Credential to present that Credential in a privacy-preserving manner using the mechanisms provided in the Issuance and Presentation Exchange (IPEX) protocol specification and the Authentic Chained Data Container (ACDC) specification. https://github.com/WebOfTrust/IETF-IPEX and https://github.com/trustoverip/tswg-acdc-specification.

EH6ekLjSr8V32WyFbGe1zXjTzFs9PkTYmupJ9H65.title: ECR Authorization vLEI Credential
EH6ekLjSr8V32WyFbGe1zXjTzFs9PkTYmupJ9H65.description: A vLEI Authorization Credential issued by a Legal Entity to a QVI for the authorization of ECR credentials

AID.description: AID of the intended recipient of the ECR credential

LEI.description: LEI of the requesting Legal Entity

personLegalName.description: Requested recipient name as provided during identity assurance

engagementContextRole.description: Requested role description i.e. 'Head of Standards'

le.description: Chain to legal entity vLEI credential

s.description: SAID of required schema of the credential pointed to by this node

l.const: Usage of a valid, unexpired, and non-revoked vLEI Credential, as defined in the associated Ecosystem Governance Framework, does not assert that the Legal Entity is trustworthy, honest, reputable in its business dealings, safe to do business with, or compliant with any laws or that an implied or expressly intended purpose will be fulfilled.

The vLEI Credential has been issued to the legal entity or person named in the vLEI Credential as the subject; and the qualified vLEI Issuer exercised reasonable care to perform the validation process set forth in the vLEI Ecosystem Governance Framework.

Privacy Considerations are applicable to QVI ECR AUTH vLEI Credentials.  It is the sole responsibility of QVIs as Issuees of QVI ECR AUTH vLEI Credentials to present these Credentials in a privacy-preserving manner using the mechanisms provided in the Issuance and Presentation Exchange (IPEX) protocol specification and the Authentic Chained Data Container (ACDC) specification.  https://github.com/WebOfTrust/IETF-IPEX and https://github.com/trustoverip/tswg-acdc-specification.
